name: Happy Valley
description:
Made this for the: Weekly Game Jam. Week 144 Theme: 'In the Dark'

Procedural generated horror-like game.

  • You run around this happy little valley trying to collect crystals while avoiding some rude monsters. 
  • To follow the theme of 'in the dark' the monsters have the power to make your screen dark when they first notice you and when you are in near proximity to you.
  • You are essentially defenseless but you can collect chests which will give u a weapon to kill a single monster on left click.
  • If the monsters keep making it dark try to remember your surroundings so you dont get caught.
